thread.title: You’ve been removed, Twitter tells staff
thread.title_full: You’ve been removed, Twitter tells staff

title: You’ve been removed, Twitter tells staff
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now You’ve been removed, Twitter tells staff Twitter had been rumoured to be about to make job cuts Chris Ratcliffe/Getty Nic Fildes Technology & Communications Editor Published 1 minute ago 
Twitter has cut 8 per cent of its workforce only days after Jack Dorsey returned to the company as chief executive. 
Some employees discovered that they had been fired only after turning on their phone to find they had already been kicked off the company’s network. 
The microblogging group had been rumoured to be preparing a round of job cuts and it confirmed that 336 roles would go as part of Mr Dorsey’s plan to improve the company’s finances. Mr Dorsey said that he had made “some tough but necessary decisions that enable Twitter to move with greater focus and Subscribe now
